duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the monitoring and tracking of compliance with various laws, regulations, industry standards, retailer requirements, and Epoca-defined criteria.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date records and documentation, ensuring comprehensive reports for management and stakeholders.
Coordinate compliance projects and support the implementation of company policies and procedures to adapt to changing compliance landscapes.
Efficiently and effectively execute all compliance-related tasks and initiatives.
Conduct thorough research and analysis to identify potential compliance risks.
Prepare reports, presentations, and documentation on compliance matters as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree. Previous experience in a consumer goods compliance-related role, regulatory affairs, or related legal capacities is a strong plus.
